sensor-type.help: Select the type of sensor to use. Options are SENSOR_TYPE_BME280 and SENSOR_TYPE_FAKE.

sensor-value-update-interval.help: Set the interval between sensor value updates in milliseconds.

filesystem-support.help: Enable filesystem for static storage of pairing information

flash-blockdevice-size.help: Size of flash block device used for filesystem

ble-privacy.help: Use Private Resolvable address if filesystem support is enabled

ble-advertise-environmental-service.help: Enable or disable advertisement of the environmental sensing service
